skdetail:

Invocation Name: bible study
des:
Do you ever struggle with understanding your Bible? 

If so, you’re not alone. 

The Simple Truth 3-Minute Bible Study helps you confidently dig deeper into scripture so that you can understand what you read. No more raging boredom, crippling voices of doubt, or the dreaded “what do I even study?” 

See for yourself why thousands choose The Simple Truth to help them understand the Bible. It’s simple to do. 

STEP ONE: Listen on your Amazon smart speaker by saying, “Alexa, play Bible study.”⠀
⠀
STEP TWO: Discover the history, culture, and original language surrounding the text and understand the Bible better than you ever did on your own. ⠀
⠀
STEP THREE: Experience a deeper connection with God as your faith grows stronger. ⠀
⠀
Stop being intimidated and bored with your Bible and start living God’s highest calling on your life – to know God and His Word on a deeper, more intimate level.

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to daily teachings you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
